languages.text: "Лишь Неумирающий есть истинный бог. Скоро ты узнаешь это — представ перед суровым судом Его. Все твои сообщники узнают". {n}Голос Кибеллы исполнен ледяной неумолимости.{/n}
"The Undying Emperor is the one true god. You will soon learn this — when you face His harsh judgement. As will all your accomplices." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with cold implacability.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Лишь Неумирающий есть истинный бог. Скоро ты узнаешь это — представ перед суровым судом Его. Все твои сообщники узнают". {n}Голос Кибеллы исполнен ледяной неумолимости.{/n}

languages.text: «El Emperador Inmortal es el único dios verdadero. Pronto lo aprenderéis cuando os enfrentéis a Su juicio. Al igual que todos vuestros cómplices». {n}La voz de Kibellah es fría e implacable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Undying Emperor is the one true god. You will soon learn this — when you face His harsh judgement. As will all your accomplices." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with cold implacability.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «El Emperador Inmortal es el único dios verdadero. Pronto lo aprenderéis cuando os enfrentéis a Su juicio. Al igual que todos vuestros cómplices». {n}La voz de Kibellah es fría e implacable.{/n}

languages.text: 「不死の皇帝は唯一にして真の神である。あなたはすぐに学ぶでしょう…その厳しい裁きを受ける時に。共犯者たちも同様です」{n}キベラの声は冷たい冷酷さに満ちている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Undying Emperor is the one true god. You will soon learn this — when you face His harsh judgement. As will all your accomplices." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with cold implacability.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「不死の皇帝は唯一にして真の神である。あなたはすぐに学ぶでしょう…その厳しい裁きを受ける時に。共犯者たちも同様です」{n}キベラの声は冷たい冷酷さに満ちている。{/n}

languages.text: “不死神皇是唯一的真神。当你和你所有同伙面对祂严厉的审判时，你很快就会意识到这一点。”{n}绮贝菈的声音无比冰冷、无情。{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Undying Emperor is the one true god. You will soon learn this — when you face His harsh judgement. As will all your accomplices." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with cold implacability.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不死神皇是唯一的真神。当你和你所有同伙面对祂严厉的审判时，你很快就会意识到这一点。”{n}绮贝菈的声音无比冰冷、无情。{/n}

languages.text: "Der Todlose Imperator ist der eine wahre Gott. Das werdet Ihr bald sehen – wenn Er Sein hartes Urteil über Euch fällt. Dasselbe gilt für all Eure Komplizen." {n}Kibellahs Stimme klingt kalt und unerbittlich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Undying Emperor is the one true god. You will soon learn this — when you face His harsh judgement. As will all your accomplices." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with cold implacability.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Der Todlose Imperator ist der eine wahre Gott. Das werdet Ihr bald sehen – wenn Er Sein hartes Urteil über Euch fällt. Dasselbe gilt für all Eure Komplizen." {n}Kibellahs Stimme klingt kalt und unerbittlich.{/n}

languages.text: « L'Immortel est le seul véritable dieu. Vous ne tarderez pas à vous en rendre compte... lorsque vous serez appelé à comparaître devant Lui, vous et tous vos comparses. » {n}La voix de Kibellah est empreinte d'une froideur implacable.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Undying Emperor is the one true god. You will soon learn this — when you face His harsh judgement. As will all your accomplices." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with cold implacability.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « L'Immortel est le seul véritable dieu. Vous ne tarderez pas à vous en rendre compte... lorsque vous serez appelé à comparaître devant Lui, vous et tous vos comparses. » {n}La voix de Kibellah est empreinte d'une froideur implacable.{/n}

languages.text: "Ölmeyen İmparator, tek hakiki tanrıdır. Çok geçmeden acımasız hükmüyle yüz yüze geldiğinde bunu öğreneceksin. Tüm suç ortakların da öğrenecekler." {n}Kibellah'nın sesi, soğukkanlı bir acımasızlıkla dolu.{/n}
languages.original_text: "The Undying Emperor is the one true god. You will soon learn this — when you face His harsh judgement. As will all your accomplices." {n}Kibellah's voice is filled with cold implacability.{/n}
